interfork_optimization.highlight: Cell-level deltas: Lighthouse near-done, Prism reviewing, progressive rollout planned pre-Amsterdam
Blob DevNet-0 stable for 2 weeks; 100% MEV blocks, 50% support partial messages
Cell deltas deployment: opt-in flag initially, enable by default after testing complete

glamsterdam_epbs.highlight: EPBS DevNet-0 target: end of February; Potuz/Prism targeting, Lodestar end-of-month
Serious deposit bug caught by Lido researchers; PR 4897 addresses issue
Fork-choice with OptimisticSync highly non-trivial; edge cases in branch removal flagged
DevNet-0 scope: self-building only, testing payload/block separation before adding builders

hegota_headliner.highlight: FOCIL proposed as Hegotá headliner; 8/11 clients have prototypes, CFI'd status
New proposal: partial reconstruction + 2D PeerDAS vertical extension (Leo)
Broad consensus for prioritizing CR/FOCIL; decision deferred to next ACDC (Feb 19)

organizational.highlight: Cell-deltas working group: weekly meetings, reach Marco to join or access notes

action_items.action: Review Leo's 2D reconstruction proposal; provide feedback via Magicians or direct contact
Review deposit bug fix PR 4897 and merge post-call

decisions.decision: Hegotá headliner selection postponed to next ACDC (Feb 19) for community review period

targets.target: End of February - EPBS DevNet-0 launch with Alpha 2 specs
February 19 - ACDC #175 to finalize Hegotá headliner selection
